content: scwinona i needed a last-minute scarf for my sister-in-law whose fruh- fruh meter ticks in at the low end but the thought of knitting one long stockinette rectangle was enough to send me running for the hills so i dug through my knitting library and came up with this the scarf with no name it s simple enough to knit up quickly this one took about two nights but interesting enough to keep you out of stockinette hell and the result a very striking scarf that works great for women men kids pets you name it looks pretty cool on the flip side too gauge 5 stitches/7 row per inch in stockinette yarn ~122 grams of worsted weight ~265 yards actual yardage will vary depending on desired length this amount yielded a 70 long scarf after blocking needles size 7 or whatever floats your gauge boat size around 6 25 wide x desired length tips the scarf will curl like a mofo while you re knitting even with the substantial garter edging do not fear as this should straighten out quite easily with blocking this is very easy mod up/down simply add/reduce the shown here in dream in color classy in vino number of stitches by multiples of 6 the stitch pattern in veritas ~122 grams the parentheses pattern cast on 32 stitches starting edge row 1-9 work in garter stitch knit every row row 10 ws k4 purl to last 4 stitches k4 scarfy goodness row 1 rs k4 k5 p1 repeat to last 4 stitches k4 even row 2-12 k4 work even knit the knits purl the purls to last 4 stitches k4 row 3 k4 k4 p1 k1 repeat to last 4 stitches k4 row 5 k4 k3 p1 k2 repeat to last 4 stitches k4 row 7 k4 k2 p1 k3 repeat to last 4 stitches k4 row 9 k4 k1 p1 k4 repeat to last 4 stitches k4 row 11 k4 p1 k5 repeat to last 4 stitches k4 repeat these 12 row to desired length ending with a row 12 ending edge row 1-9 work in garter stitch knit every row bind off finishing weave in all ends wash block wear turn up the knack and belt out my scwinona until the people in the white jackets come and take you away for additional
